subject: CALOPS ready for PROD — need backend /api/ops/* endpoints deployed
body:
Hey Fulton,

CALOPS frontend is now merged to PROD branch.

Need the backend /api/ops/* endpoints deployed to PROD:
- /api/ops/user-activity
- /api/ops/data-health

Currently:
- LOCAL: ✅
- TEST: ✅
- PROD: ❌ (404)

Please deploy calendar-be-af to PROD when ready.

— Dash
